strings: <voice_0x010018F7><se_def>Dhoulmagus: How am I ever going to master real spells when my every waking minute is taken up with mind<->numbing chores?

<voice_0x010018F9><se_def>Dhoulmagus: A legendary sceptre,
sealed away in Castle Trodain?
<voice_0x010018FD><se_def>Dhoulmagus: That's it! That's the answer! If I only had that sceptre, I could wield any magic I wanted!
<voice_0x01001900><se_low>Rylus: I have warned you about reading my grimoires without prior permission, have I not?

<voice_0x01001901><se_low>Rylus: They are not for your eyes!
You still have to grasp even the most
basic principles of magic use!
<voice_0x01001902><se_low>Rylus: And yet you cannot even follow that one simple rule? Bah! I'd be better off with a dog as an apprentice! At least it would obey me!

<voice_0x01001904><se_low>Rylus: Where are you going?
Dhoulmagus! Come back here!
